content: When the next cart has been defeated, progress up the path. As you approached the cart, you will have heard someone shout for help. Who that is, will soon become clear as you climb the stairs and hear the cries for help again.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Gray-Bronze Cart'.
The content is as follows:
When the next cart has been defeated, progress up the path. As you approached the cart, you will have heard someone shout for help. Who that is, will soon become clear as you climb the stairs and hear the cries for help again.
